import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Form, Button,Container } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import FormContainer from '../components/FormContainer' import CheckoutSteps from '../components/CheckoutSteps' import { saveShippingAddress } from '../actions/cartActions' const ShippingScreen = ({ history }) => { const cart = useSelector((state) => state.cart) const { shippingAddress } = cart const [address, setAddress] = useState(shippingAddress.address) const [city, setCity] = useState(shippingAddress.city) const [mobile, setMobile] = useState(shippingAddress.mobile) const dispatch = useDispatch() const submitHandler = (e) => { e.preventDefault() dispatch(saveShippingAddress({ address, city,mobile })) history.push('/payment') } return (

Shipping

Address setAddress(e.target.value)} > City setCity(e.target.value)} > Mobile Number setMobile(e.target.value)} >
) } export default ShippingScreen
